name: Country Chicken Killer
description:
Hey you! Do you hate chickens with a passion? Have you ever wanted to stick a gun right in a chicken's face and blow it's head off? Well here's the perfect game for you! You can shoot the shit out of (fictional) flying chickens in a small and low-quality video game!

(Disclaimer: chickens do not fly in real life normally, if you see a chicken flying above 10 feet in the air, call the local exorcist, as it is usually dark magic)
